ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Nallapaneni Lakshmi has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 8 years. Currently this candidate is employed as an Unix System administrator at Canon. Nallapaneni has extensive knowledge of Sun Solaris, Veritas Volume Manager, Network File System, Linux, SAN, Veritas File System, VMware, UNIX, Network Attached Storage, Linux Red Hat, Veritas Cluster, VCS, TCP/IP, ITIL, FTP, Veritas, Telnet, SUN Hardware > Sun Fire Servers, SUN Hardware, Cluster Server, Apache WEB Server. So far Nallapaneni has not gained any managerial experience.
